author: Matthew Neale
description: A Tiki-styled drink based on aged rum and cognac with lime juice, orange liqueur and almond syrup.
name: Suit & Tai
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients and strain into glass filled with crushed ice and serve with short straws
